greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle T(n,k), n>=1, 0<=k<=A000041(n), read by rows: row n gives the coefficients of the chromatic polynomial of the ranked poset L(n) of partitions of n, highest powers first.
comment: The ranked poset L(n) of partitions is defined in A002846.  A partition of n into k parts is connected to another partition of n into k+1 parts that results from splitting one part of the first partition into two parts.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 1..9, flattened
Olivier Gérard, The ranked posets L(2),...,L(8)
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Chromatic Polynomial
xref: Row sums (for n>1) and last elements of rows give: A000004.
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Jun 15 2012
ext: Edited by _Alois P. Heinz_ at the suggestion of _Gus Wiseman_, May 02 2016
